page.title: 122 Playground Games
page.content: PARRY: is a game where you have a person in goal and 2 on the pitch, if the ball goes outside the 18 yard area one of the 2 people on pitch may take a shot .If it gets past the person in goal it will be a point to the people on the pitch.If the person in goal catches the ball without it touching the ground it will be a point to the person in the goal.Inside the 18 yard area you can only score points with a header or a volley.The first person to 10 points wins. FOX AND HOUNDS: is a game where one person is Â£it'; first he has to count to a hundred while all the others hide. When he or she has counted they have to pull their sleeve up to show that they are Â£it' and then go and find the others. The first one who gets Â£tagged' is Â£it' for the next game.
